tophersmith.security.headers.impl

Class StrictTransportSecurityHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.impl.AbstractHeader
      • tophersmith.security.headers.impl.StrictTransportSecurityHeader

  • public class StrictTransportSecurityHeader
extends AbstractHeader
    The Strict-Transport-Security header is used in response headers inform the browser User-Agent that this site must be communicated with using HTTPS. This defends against Man in the Middle attacks
    Author:
    Chris Smith

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StrictTransportSecurityHeader()
      Constructs a new Strict-Transport-Security Header object By default, sets the max-age to 1 year and enables includeSubDomains

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String buildHeaderValue()

      StrictTransportSecurityHeader disableIncludeSubDomains()

      disable preload for this header
      StrictTransportSecurityHeader enableIncludeSubDomains()
      enables includeSubDomains on this header
      StrictTransportSecurityHeader enablePreload()
      enable preload for this header
      StrictTransportSecurityHeader setMaxAge(String ageInSeconds)
      sets the max-age to the given input age (in seconds)
      void validate()
      max-age must be set and contain non-negative numbers
